changeSet.author: gustavo
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE tb_restaurant( id bigserial NOT NULL, name varchar(250) NOT NULL, fk_restaurant_category BIGINT REFERENCES tb_restaurant_category(id) NOT NULL, street varchar(250), neighborhood varchar(100), address_number varchar(10), phone varchar(11), PRIMARY KEY ("id") );

changeSet.author: gustavo
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO tb_restaurant (name, fk_restaurant_category, street, neighborhood, address_number, phone) VALUES ('Restaurante Sem Futuro', 1, 'Avenida João Carlos', 'Centro', '293', '3434323434'), ('Ao Ponto!', 2, 'Avenida Jõao Picanha Nunes', 'Contra', '327', '34992255444'), ('Aqui Agora', 3, 'Rua Akiper Tim', 'Do Lado', '12', '3432355779'), ('É refresco!', 4, 'Rua No Dos Outros', 'Apimentado', '89', '34997974551'), ('Bão Tchê', 5, 'Avenida Estudante Alexandre', 'Eminium Faria', '516', '3433556363'), ('Fatia da Tia Fátima', 6, 'Rua Nº3', 'Toss Cana', '8', '3433366161'), ('TaKaro', 7, 'Rua MiaKuda', 'Saiko Reno', '33', '34994569112');
